mapper.sql: classify_id, classify_name, classify_status, parent_id, descr, pubdate
mapper.select:
select
from goods_classify
and classify_name like "%" #{classifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(0) from goods_classify
and classify_name like "%" #{classifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
mapper.insert: insert into goods_classify (classify_id, classify_name, parent_id,descr) values (#{classifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into goods_classify
classify_id, classify_name, parent_id, descr,
